name: project-template
description: AI-assisted development project template with health monitoring

scripts.check:scope: grep -r 'TODO\|FIXME\|HACK' src/ || echo 'No scope violations found'
scripts.check:all: npm run check:health && npm run check:scope && npm run check:size && npm run check:imports && npm run check:purpose
scripts.discipline:daily: npm run check:size && npm run check:scope
scripts.session:start: echo '# Session $(date)' >> SESSION_LOG.md && npm run check:health
scripts.session:end: npm run check:all && echo '## Session Complete: $(date)' >> SESSION_LOG.md
